events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit me at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request involves returning a product and obtaining a refund; the case is categorized under Refund.
The case has been assigned to customer service representative Emma for handling the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your order. I'm here to help you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the reason for the return so I can assist you better?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is just too small for me, so I would like to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send the jacket back using the pre-paid return label I will email you shortly.
I appreciate that, thank you! I'll wait to receive the label and send the jacket back immediately.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to appear.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and everything is in order. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since you confirmed receipt of the refund and there are no outstanding issues, we will now close this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
